text: He asamani granthera adhikaribrnda! Ya kichu ami abatirna karechi tara upara bisbasa sthapana kara, ya se granthera satyayana kare ebam ya tomadera nikata rayeche purba theke. (Bisbasa sthapana kara) emana ha'oyara age'i ye, ami muche deba aneka ceharake ebam atahpara seguloke ghuriye deba pascat dike kimba abhisampata karaba tadera prati yemana kare abhisampata karechi achahabe-sabatera upara. Ara allahara nirdesa abasya'i karyakara habe.
